headline.main: HUNTZIGER'S NOTES SAVED FROM CRASH; Important Observations Made on 7,500-Mile African Tour Given to Army Cabinet

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Nov. 13 -- No successor will be appointed to General Charles Huntziger as Minister of War and Commander of the French Land Forces until after the national funeral that will be held in Vichy on Saturday for him and the six other victims of the accident to the airplane on which he was returning from North Africa.
abstract: successor in Cabinet to be apptd after funeral; Hitler sends condolences; successor discussed; notes on tour saved
